text: @realDonaldTrump SHUT UP. You are the fake news, you are the one who minimized the threat of the Coronavirus, you are the one who insulted the Chinese and by extent anyone other than white, you are the one who ruined diversity in certain places and YOU ARE BAD FOR AMERICA.
